Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 24 mins
features: (Luxury material): Made of plexiglass, shatterproof, bendable, will not be damaged if accidentally dropped on the ground, not a real glass mirror, very safe, your kids and pets can play safely
(Super Thick):Because our thickness is 0.125" thick, so the definition is very high, the image is clear and undistorted
(Easy Installation):Package coming with powerful double sided foam tape. It can be easily installed on smooth walls, latex paint walls, light-hole tiled wall furniture or wooden doors
(Applicable Scenes):Mirror can be used as gym mirrors for home gym, bedroom, closet, door, Large wall mirror for bedroom, body mirror, wall,wall-mounted mirrors,workout mirror
(Note): Before the first use, tear off a layer of protective film (if the protective film is not torn off, the mirror surface will be blurred). Only clean the mirror with a soft cloth and warm water

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This sis a great mirror for shaving in the shower, but as for the fogless i call BS. it does fog up, but spray it with water and its fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars does not do the (very simple) job it is supposed to do - stay fogless and untarnished.
reviews.reviewText: Product does not do the (very simple) job it is supposed to do - it does not stay fogless and untarnished even during the first week. Absolutely worthless, and yet sold for $8. Then, when I went to return it, I was told I was passed the return date. Save yourself time and headache and pay more for a better product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not a good product overall. Useable, but not ideal.
reviews.reviewText: I know it's cheap, but shouldn't it still be in "new condition" when you receive it?**Mirror was quite scratched up already when I removed the plastic film. I complained and asked for a replacement. Amazon did replace it, but 2nd mirror is more scratched than the first one. It is apparent that they do not get the plastic covering immediately, and they become scratched at some point in storage, prior to the plastic protective cover being put on. So brand new but still scratched all to heck.**Ironically, the brand new unused "fog free" mirror is foggy just in its default reflection. So the mirror is foggy/dim prior to even using it.**Once used you will discover mirror is not fog free by any stretch of the imagination. It does not repel fog any more than a normal mirror. The only plus is that it is made for the shower, so you have a handy hanger to latch it on to. Overall, not really an improvement from using a regular mirror, other than the adhesive hanger/hook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Addition, Awesome for Shaving (Does Fog Up, is Manageable)
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. If you like steamy showers, the mirror will fog up a bit but if the fan in your bathroom is running, it should be a okay! If that doesn’t work, keep the door cracked a bit to prevent fogging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mirror fogs up repeatedly. Constantly having to wipe it down to be able to see in it.Otherwise it's a perfect size and the hook that came with it is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice size and easy to put up but it states anti fog yet it fogs up so the anti fog is untrue but all in all it’s a great mirror and we would buy it again if we needed a mirror for the shower

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Can I leave negative stars?? Not fog proof AT ALL. Totally useless/waste of money.
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed in this product. The reviews stated that it was actually fog free. Mine fogged up almost immediately the first use and now fogs up immediately with EVERY USE.Someone mentioned that the seller sent them a replacement that worked better than the first one. If they reach out to me and send one that works, I will gladly update my review.As for now, this product is totally USELESS and a complete waste of money. Do yourself a favor and buy something different.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install. I had no issue with the fog and I take a shower with hot water.
